madame_beaufort.name: Madame Beaufort
madame_beaufort.background: A burly, flamboyant proprietor of the notorious brothel-tavern combo, The Poop Deck. With broad shoulders, a muscular build, and a five o'clock shadow, Madame Beaufort's shoulder-length blond locks—possibly a wig—complete their striking appearance. Known for their booming laugh, sharp wit, and an uncanny ability to diffuse tension with humor or intimidation.
madame_beaufort.secret_knowledge: Hub of local secrets and gossip

doctor_choppy.name: Doctor Choppy
doctor_choppy.background: A disgraced veterinary school dropout with an unsettling enthusiasm for amputations. Operates The Yellow Jack with questionable skill and unwavering confidence. His motto is 'When in doubt, apply more rum,' whether to himself or his patients.
doctor_choppy.secret_knowledge: Questionable medical practices that sometimes work

nurse_scarlet.name: Nurse Scarlet
nurse_scarlet.background: A shapely redhead with a penchant for clumsiness and naivety. Lacks formal training but compensates with boundless enthusiasm. Infatuated with Doctor Choppy, loyally following his lead despite his dubious methods.
nurse_scarlet.secret_knowledge: Accidental witness to many town secrets

jean_pierre_rousseau.name: Jean-Pierre 'One-Eye' Rousseau
jean_pierre_rousseau.background: A grizzled former privateer with a weathered face and a massive scar across his left eye socket. Known for his booming laugh and commanding presence. Co-owns Three Sheets to the Wind with his wife Marie.
jean_pierre_rousseau.secret_knowledge: Old privateer routes and hidden coves

marie_rousseau.name: Marie 'Hurricane' Rousseau
marie_rousseau.background: An ex-smuggler with a razor-sharp tongue and a seemingly unquenchable thirst. Handles the finances and operations of Three Sheets to the Wind with ruthless efficiency. Known for out-drinking sailors and outsmarting rivals.
marie_rousseau.secret_knowledge: Underground trade networks and smuggling routes

old_tom_whitewood.name: Old Tom Whitewood
old_tom_whitewood.background: A retired ship's carpenter from Bristol, England, now in his early 60s. Runs The Scurvy Log, a tidy, neutral establishment where all factions are welcome—provided they follow the rules. Quiet and observant, a master of his craft.

bilge_rat_billy.name: Bilge Rat Billy Hawkins
bilge_rat_billy.background: A scraggly, unwashed former pirate who spends his days drinking himself into oblivion. Missing three fingers and a leg, claims to have once had a golden peg leg—now traded for rum. A fixture outside The Poop Deck.
bilge_rat_billy.secret_knowledge: Old pirate tales and buried secrets

mary_oshea.name: Mary O'Shea
mary_oshea.background: Marooned on Crimson Reef as a child after a shipwreck. Raised by Irish farmer parents, Mary's tragic past has made her resilient and resourceful. Clings to hope and memories of a life she once dreamed of.
mary_oshea.secret_knowledge: Island survival skills and local history

dirk_scuttle.name: Dirk Scuttle
dirk_scuttle.background: A burly man with a deep scar and enormous beer belly. Owner of The Drunken Gambler, keeps his past shrouded in mystery. A shrewd businessman who rarely intervenes in fights unless they threaten his operations.

captain_mutumbe.name: Captain Mutumbe
captain_mutumbe.background: A former slave who led a successful revolt, commandeering his captors' ship. A towering figure of calm authority who wears no fabric garments but proudly dons a captain's hat and a necklace of bones, including the thumbs of his former masters.

itzcoatl.name: Itzcoatl
itzcoatl.background: The imposing 7-foot-tall chief of The Native's Village. A masterful diplomat who handles interactions with the Chelo (light-skinned outsiders) despite his people's tragic history. Grieving for his lost wife, Amoxtli, and devoted to his daughter Necuahual.
itzcoatl.secret_knowledge: Ancient tribal secrets and sacred sites

necuahual.name: Necuahual
necuahual.background: Itzcoatl's teenage daughter, a curious and adventurous soul. Often seen on the outskirts of Thieves' Landing, observing the Chelo with fascination. Wields a modest sword salvaged from a Spanish shipwreck.
necuahual.secret_knowledge: Blend of tribal wisdom and outsider knowledge

imeni_garcia.name: Imeni Garcia
imeni_garcia.background: The proprietor of The Anaconda, a statuesque woman in her mid-30s with a commanding presence. Despite her pleasant demeanor, rarely smiles, her past clouded by the mysterious disappearance of her parents.

capitan_perez.name: Capitan Perez
capitan_perez.background: The cunning leader of the Spaniards on Serpent's Haven. Always seen with a wine glass in hand, exudes confidence and control. Commands with charm and calculation, maintaining an iron grip on his people while indulging in luxuries.
